anime.description: Endra is an unknown world beneath the surface of Earth, where the giant Adamas shines above, and seven-coloured bands drift across the skies. One day, http://anidb.net/ch79616 [Asanaga Shun], an ordinary yet positive and bright 15-year-old middle school boy who lives in the Land Above, discovers a mysterious crystal at his scientific businessman father`s company, and the moment he touches the crystal, he is transported to Endra. There, he meets the recently captured 16-year-old prince http://anidb.net/ch79612 [Emilio], who strongly despises the current king, Deruzain, and was imprisoned after seeking vengeance against the monarch. Source: ANN

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: new
tag.description: Not based on anything, the story is a new work, usually made up by the people involved in creating the anime. Generally if an original work (原作) credit is given, it will be to the studio, or director, or other members of the production team.

episode.title: イグナーツ
Ignauts
Ignaz
Ignauts
episode.summary: When they`re ambushed by a band of revolutionaries, Shun and Emilio make surprising new allies. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 旅立ち
Journey
Le départ
Tabidachi
episode.summary: Shun and Emilio escape to a hideout but soon abandon it to begin their journey to defeat Delzaine. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エンドラ
Endora
Endora
Endora
episode.summary: After escaping the castle, an encounter with an old friend helps reveal some of the mysteries surrounding Endora. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ライド
Ride
Ride
Ride
episode.summary: Shun Asanaga, a young man with an obsession with crystals, finds himself pulled into a world within one. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 孤島
Lone Isle
Kotou
episode.summary: After taking to the seas on a battered ship, the Ignauts head for an island to recruit the help of the Zoozians. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 少女
Girl
Shoujo
episode.summary: While visiting the port city of Ametius to obtain a ship, a deadly killer threatens the adventure. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決意
Determination
Ketsui
episode.summary: After reuniting with Pascal and Alicia, Shun`s determination to return home is stronger than ever. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 襲撃
Assault
Shuugeki
episode.summary: Lacking in numbers to revolt, the Ignauts consider an alliance with the very group that attacks them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: バベルの光
The Light of Babel
Babel no Hikari
episode.summary: The showdown reaches full swing as Babel starts up, bringing an end to an enemy in more than one way. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 深層
Depths
Shinsou
episode.summary: Upon reaching Babylon, the Ignauts are deceived by more than its size and the traps that await inside. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 想い
Feelings
Omoi
episode.summary: As Delzaine and the Ignauts both close in on Babylon, Pascal attempts to solve the mystery of the decreasing Warp Particles. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 父と子
Father and Child
Chichi to Ko
episode.summary: Alicia discovers the truth about her father during a surprise encounter with dragons. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 軌跡
Tracks
Kiseki
episode.summary: While Pascal and Joseph are busy inspecting Babel, the others look back on how far they`ve come. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 憧憬
Longing
Shoukei
episode.summary: In order to recruit the help of the Gradido and the island Zoozians, the Ignauts must fight back against a naval invasion. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: モンスター
Monster
Monster
episode.summary: When they attempt to save a crippled village, the Ignauts run into an old enemy and make an unexpected new ally. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 再起
Resume
Saiki
episode.summary: With chaos and riots on the rise, the Ignauts make plans to bring order while marching back towards the capital for more research. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 過去
Past
Kako
episode.summary: After hearing Asanaga`s shocking declaration, Shun and Emilio discover secrets of the past, the truth of their families, and a shared bond. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 地上
Surface
Chijou
episode.summary: Taken to the surface, Shun introduces Emilio to his familiar world and a confrontation with Shun`s father triggers some of Emilio`s forgotten memories. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 囚人
Prisoner
Shuujin
episode.summary: While fields and forests decay, deep under the dungeons of the castle, Shun and Emilio learn more about the past before being swept away. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 帰還
Return
Kikan
episode.summary: No sooner is the group welcomed home to the castle than a meanace appears in the forest and threatens the capital. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 危機
Crisis
Kiki
episode.summary: Back in Endora, the Ignauts face up against a monsterous Ibelda and learn about the ancient ruins which may be funneling Warp Particles to the surface. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 対峙
Confrontation
Taiji
episode.summary: Though troubled by his father`s actions, Shun learns about his motivation and the reason they`re able to travel between worlds. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 終焉
Demise
Shuuen
episode.summary: The final battle to determine the fate of Endora balances atop the high-reaching spire of Tir Na Nog. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決闘
Showdown
Kettou
episode.summary: While Demetrio and the Ignauts battle Ibelda, Shun, Emilio and Falarion go to Tir Na Nog to destroy the device draining Warp Particles from Endora. Source: crunchyroll
